name: Ping Pong Pinball: Old Arcade Game X Free by Cobalt Play Games
name_original: Ping Pong Pinball: Old Arcade Game X Free by Cobalt Play Games
description:
WORLDS TOP PLAYERS. Send an email and screenshot to games@cobaltplay.com if you beat any of these scores, we'll post your name here.
1) Justin Mares: 2386
2) Miki C: 1898
3) Martin Finch: 1602

Super addictive and simple to play.
Slide the paddle left and right at the bottom of the screen and keep the balls bouncing as long as possible. It's classic arcade ping pong pinball at it's best.

Happy Gaming
Cobalt Play
